Articles.Content:
Greetings, I'm Hyperbob. I've been playing KSP for a while and just recently started playing with mods (I think that fairings are god's gift to kerbals). I've been in and out of the add-on board and Spaceport repeatedly, almost to the point where I'd drive myself crazy with the number of browser tabs I have open as I compare different mods and follow trails of "oh so-and-so isn't maintaining this anymore so I took it over" and "this mod is part of this bigger thing oh but you can also use it with this one and with this other thing too". I finally decided properly register so that I could pose a question about modifying some parts from version 0.19, so this is technically my second post, but I've never really been one for introductions.

Anywho, that's a bit about me. I have a feeling that I'll be posting more once I get into things. If there's something you need me for, I'm open to private communication, but I can't imagine what it would be for.
Hello Hyperbob. Welcome to our forum.
Welcome aboard. You should check out the Add-on Releases and Projects Showcase subforum, along with Add-on Development.
I like your name. Sounds like a silly superhero.

I like your name. Sounds like a silly superhero.

Thanks! Usually people associate it with ADHD, but superhero is a new one. I like it. Maybe I'll get a cape.

I shall begin thinking of costumes and your catchphrase.

Welcome aboard!
